#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;



int main() {
  int n,i;
    cin>>n;
    char a[n];
    cin>>a;
    float b,c;
    cin>>b>>c;
    if(b>c)
        {
        cout<<"NO\n";
        return 0;
    }
    float s=b;
    for(i=1;i<n;i++)
        {
        if(a[i]==a[i-1])
            {
            s=s+b;
            if(s>c)
                {
                cout<<"NO\n";
                return 0;
            }
        }
        else s=b;
       
    }
    cout<<"YES\n";
}
